text: @WHO @DrTedros Corona virus has spikes on it which is the rough strain on it which protects the virus from getting killed. If we use the technique of FREDERICK GRIFFITH'S experiments by killing the the protein spikes(s protein) it can cure us.@WHO @narendramodi @PMOIndia #COVID19 #SARSCoV2
